summary: Explains the use, configuration, best practices, and troubleshooting of subagents for task delegation and context management.

structure.title: Subagents
structure.summary: Explains the use and configuration of subagents for task delegation and context management, including best practices and troubleshooting.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Why use subagents?
nodes.title: Why use subagents?
nodes.summary: Explains the use of subagents to manage context bloat and isolate detailed work, detailing scenarios for their application and non-application.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Configuration
nodes.title: Configuration
nodes.summary: Describes configuration of subagents using dictionaries or CompiledSubAgent objects, detailing both simple and complex workflow setups.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Configuration > SubAgent (Dictionary-based)
nodes.title: SubAgent (Dictionary-based)
nodes.summary: Defines subagents using dictionaries with required and optional fields for configuration.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Configuration > CompiledSubAgent
nodes.title: CompiledSubAgent
nodes.summary: Describes the CompiledSubAgent for complex workflows, including fields for unique identifier, description, and a compiled LangGraph graph.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Using SubAgent
nodes.title: Using SubAgent
nodes.summary: Demonstrates how to use a SubAgent for conducting in-depth research with internet search capabilities.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Using CompiledSubAgent
nodes.title: Using CompiledSubAgent
nodes.summary: Demonstrates how to use a pre-built LangGraph graph as a CompiledSubAgent for complex tasks, such as data analysis.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > The general-purpose subagent
nodes.title: The general-purpose subagent
nodes.summary: Describes the general-purpose subagent's role in executing complex tasks and reducing context bloat in deep agents.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > The general-purpose subagent > When to use it
nodes.title: When to use it
nodes.summary: Describes the use of a general-purpose subagent for executing complex tasks and returning concise results, reducing context bloat.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Best practices
nodes.title: Best practices
nodes.summary: Best practices for configuring subagents, including clear descriptions, detailed prompts, minimal tool sets, task-specific models, and concise results.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Best practices > Write clear descriptions
nodes.title: Write clear descriptions
nodes.summary: Guidelines for writing clear and specific descriptions for subagents to ensure the main agent makes correct decisions.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Best practices > Keep system prompts detailed
nodes.title: Keep system prompts detailed
nodes.summary: Provides detailed guidance on crafting system prompts for subagents, including specific instructions and output formats.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Best practices > Minimize tool sets
nodes.title: Minimize tool sets
nodes.summary: Discusses the importance of providing subagents with only necessary tools to enhance focus and security.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Best practices > Choose models by task
nodes.title: Choose models by task
nodes.summary: Select appropriate models for subagents based on task requirements, such as legal review or financial analysis.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Best practices > Return concise results
nodes.title: Return concise results
nodes.summary: Guide subagents to provide concise summaries with key insights, confidence scores, and next actions, avoiding raw data and detailed outputs.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Common patterns
nodes.title: Common patterns
nodes.summary: Discusses creating specialized subagents for various tasks like data collection, analysis, and report writing, detailing their roles and workflow.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Common patterns > Multiple specialized subagents
nodes.title: Multiple specialized subagents
nodes.summary: Describes creating specialized subagents for data collection, analysis, and report writing, detailing their roles and workflow.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Troubleshooting
nodes.title: Troubleshooting
nodes.summary: Provides solutions for issues related to subagent delegation, context management, and subagent selection.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Troubleshooting > Subagent not being called
nodes.title: Subagent not being called
nodes.summary: Describes issues and solutions when the main agent fails to delegate tasks to subagents, emphasizing specific descriptions and explicit delegation instructions.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Troubleshooting > Context still getting bloated
nodes.title: Context still getting bloated
nodes.summary: Solutions for preventing context bloat when using subagents, including concise result returns and filesystem storage for large data.

nodes.path: subagents > Subagents > Troubleshooting > Wrong subagent being selected
nodes.title: Wrong subagent being selected
nodes.summary: Describes the issue of main agent selecting the wrong subagent and provides a solution to clearly differentiate subagents through detailed descriptions.
